Description:
The FHIR Goal resource defines desired health outcomes to be achieved by a patient over a period of time such as "lower blood pressure in the next three months" or "Lose 10 lbs by X date".

The create interaction stores goal information as a received document.
SampleRequest:
<Goal xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<status value="in-progress" />

<category>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.4.737184.20005" />

<code value="3" />

<display value="Weight" />

</coding>

<text value="Weight" />

</category>

<description>

<text value="Weight < 2890 lb 7.5 oz (42 kg)" />

</description>

<subject>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/elBaYlo9AE3qgt1RhzEy4Bw3" />

<display value="Akshat Kumar" />

</subject>

<note>

<text value="Text12lhbpib
" />

</note>

</Goal>
SampleResponse:
<Goal xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="eE-3euSagEVWGUVHCPruchDq7RnWiBe1MnoqrsIrS.X-4AMBrE8AQasYNual5iMFQAaMxyWyfBANL3QKgYzHupajLspJkolCif8ZAO.9ChPu.h6GkIOFQTm2c8rnjQBsd3" />

<status value="in-progress" />

<category>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.4.737184.20005" />

<code value="3" />

<display value="Weight" />

</coding>

<text value="Weight" />

</category>

<description>

<text value="Weight < 2890 lb 7.5 oz (42 kg)" />

</description>

<subject>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/elBaYlo9AE3qgt1RhzEy4Bw3" />

<display value="Akshat Kumar" />

</subject>

<note>

<text value="Text12lhbpib
" />

</note>

</Goal>
Remarks: The response body is optionally returned, based on the Prefer header included in the Request.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Based on the category number by default, with Title and then Synonym as backups. Can use SNOMED if OID is specified and a mapping table has been built by the Epic community member. Ex: treatment, dietary, or behavioral.

description.Name: description
description.Description: What the goal entails. SNOMED code or other text describing the goal.

expressedBy.Name: expressedBy
expressedBy.Description: Who is responsible for creating the goal. "Author" in DSTU2. The author name, author type, and contributor.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the goal is intended for. Patient FHIR Resource ID.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Based on the category number by default, with Title and then Synonym as backups. Can use SNOMED if OID is specified and a mapping table has been built by the Epic community member. Ex: treatment, dietary, or behavioral.

description.Name: description
description.Description: What the goal entails. SNOMED code or other text describing the goal.

expressedBy.Name: expressedBy
expressedBy.Description: Who is responsible for creating the goal. "Author" in DSTU2.

id.Name: id
id.Description: The FHIR ID for the created Goal resource.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the goal. Always "in-progress" for newly created goals.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the goal is intended for. Patient FHIR Resource ID.
